First, build the package from this repository, or just download it from github
```{r}
devtools::load_all()
library(dplyr)
```

Now, simulate data from a multi-indicator RI-CLPM

```{r}
dat = simRICLPMl(
  waves = 5,
  num_indicators_x = 5,
  num_indicators_y = 5,
  variance.p = 0.5,
  variance.q = 0.5,
  stability.p = 0.20,
  stability.q = 0.20,
  cross.q = 0.30,
  cross.p = 0.30,
  cov.pq = 0.00,
  variance.between.x = 0.5,
  variance.between.y = 0.5
  )

ind_list = generate_riclpm_indicator_lists(waves = 5, num_indicators = 5)


lavaan::lavaan(model = estimateRICLPMl(waves = 5,
                time_varying_y = ind_list$time_varying_y,
                time_varying_x = ind_list$time_varying_x
                
),
data = dat$data)
                 

```
